comments.body: non-blocking: we should stop importing `k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubeadm/test"` in `.../app`.
why add this unit test in this PR?
Thanks! Do this for the scheduler args as well to be consistent?

Here is an example:
```
=== RUN   TestGetControllerManagerCommand                                                                                     
--- FAIL: TestGetControllerManagerCommand (0.00s)                                                                             
        manifests_test.go:647: [custom IPv6 networking] failed getAPIServerCommand:                                           
                expected:                                                                                                     
                [--address=127.0.0.1 --allocate-node-cidrs=true --cluster-cidr=2001:db8::/66 --cluster-signing-cert-file=/var/
lib/certs/ca.crt --cluster-signing-key-file=/var/lib/certs/ca.key --controllers=*,bootstrapsigner,tokencleaner --kubeconfig=/e
tc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf --leader-elect=true --node-cidr-mask-size=80 --root-ca-file=/var/lib/certs/ca.crt --serv
ice-account-private-key-file=/var/lib/certs/sa.key --use-service-account-credentials=true kube-controller-manager]            
                saw:                                                                                                          
                [--address=127.0.0.1 --allocate-node-cidrs=true --cluster-cidr=2001:db8::/64 --cluster-signing-cert-file=/var/
lib/certs/ca.crt --cluster-signing-key-file=/var/lib/certs/ca.key --controllers=*,bootstrapsigner,tokencleaner --kubeconfig=/e
tc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf --leader-elect=true --node-cidr-mask-size=80 --root-ca-file=/var/lib/certs/ca.crt --serv
ice-account-private-key-file=/var/lib/certs/sa.key --use-service-account-credentials=true kube-controller-manager]            
                expectedShort:                                                                                                
                [--cluster-cidr=2001:db8::/66]                                                                                
                sawShort:                                                                                                     
                [--cluster-cidr=2001:db8::/64]                                                                                
                                                                
```
...and add a new unit test case for the expected behavior
@luxas I see the tests still failing here

@ss22ever Since you're changing the value of the default admission chain, you need to remove the PersistentVolumeLabeler admission controller in all other test cases than these two newly-added unit test which do expect the deprecated admission controller to be there.

Hence, remove the `PersistentVolumeLabeler` controller in all places except these two above with `CloudProvider` set.
If folks enable parallel tests this could be an issue...

diffHunk:

	kubeadmconstants.KubernetesDir = fmt.Sprintf("%s/etc/kubernetes", tmpdir)
	defer func() { kubeadmconstants.KubernetesDir = "/etc/kubernetes" }()

	var tests = []struct {
